synopsis.text: Charlotte's hopes for a quiet summer day with Ichika at his home are dashed when Cecilia, Houki, Lingyin, and Laura all show up with the same idea. The group ends up spending the day together, enjoying games and a shared meal. Later in the season, Houki is pleasantly surprised when Ichika visits her family's shrine during a summer festival. Despite her initial plans to explore the festival alone with Ichika, they are joined by Ran, and amidst the fireworks, Houki attempts to confess her feelings to him. Meanwhile, Ichika's peaceful holiday becomes anything but, as the girls continue to make unexpected appearances at his doorstep.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
